about_me.des: I am a hardworking and ambitious individual with a great passion for cybersecurity research. I am currently studying digital sciences in an engineering school in France and I am also working on the research subject of hardware reverse engineering. I love learning new skills and sharing my knowledge with others. Also a developer for several years I have created many projects in different programming languages.

projects.degate: Degate is an open source software for chip reverse engineering.
projects.tiginet: TigiNet is a neural network library in C++.

career.research_desc: Research works in collaboration with a French researcher and a Russian laboratory on different subjects like hardware reverse engineering, cryptography or template matching algorithms. Fork of Degate : software for reverse engineering of silicon chips in C++, and porting it for allowing multiplatform use.
career.publication_d_desc: ✍ "Se protéger de la rétro-ingénierie matérielle -- État de l'art des méthodes de protection existantes", Hackable 33, pp. 68-83, 2020.
career.publication_c_desc: ✍ "Le coût de la rétro-ingénierie du silicium -- Matériel nécessaire et risques associés", Hackable 32, pp. 106-115, 2019.
career.publication_b_desc: ✍ "Rétro-ingénierie matérielle : comprendre le silicium -- État de l'art des méthodes d'analyses de puce de silicium", Hackable 31, pp. 108-114, 2019.
career.publication_a_desc: ✍ "Rétro-ingénierie matérielle : accéder au silicium -- État de l'art des méthodes de décapsulations et de déstratifications de puce de silicium", Hackable 31, pp. 98-107, 2019.
career.research_lab: Research projects in a University lab
career.research_lab_desc: Worked on hardware reverse engineering and cryptography at the Laboratory of Cryptology and Operational Virology (C + V)°.
career.esiea_desc: Currently an engineering student at ESIEA, Graduate Engineering School in Digital Sciences and Technologies. I'm focusing my university curriculum on cybersecurity. I also worked on operating system science and neural networks (Creation of TigiNet : a C++ library for creating neural networks without dependency).
career.baccalaureate_desc: Baccalaureate in scientific series with engineering sciences specialty and I.S.N. (Computer science and digital) option. With honors.
